author: USA TODAY, Tony Plohetski, USA TODAY NETWORK
title: Fauci guided U.S. through AIDS crisis, too. Survivors say it's a roadmap for coronavirus.
description: Survivors of the AIDS crisis are eager to share lessons they learned decades ago to guide U.S. through coronavirus pandemic.
content:
The slight, bespectacled doctor speaking at a White House briefing on TV revived bleak, 30-year-old memories for Gary Cooper.
Dr. Anthony Faucis reassuring voice guided Cooper and thousands of gay men worldwide through the terrifying AIDS crisis of the 1980s… [+9700 chars]
